Hero.description: A complete Next.js application template with user authentication, payment integration, internationalization, theme switching, and other essential features for modern applications. Get started quickly and focus on your business logic.

Features.title: Why Choose This Template
Features.description: This template integrates essential features for modern app development, letting you focus on business logic

cards.title: User Authentication
cards.description: Integrated NextAuth.js with support for multiple login methods including GitHub, Google, Apple, and more.

cards.title: Payment Integration
cards.description: Complete subscription and payment system with support for Stripe and other payment platforms, including billing management.

cards.title: Internationalization
cards.description: Built-in i18n solution based on next-intl, easily add multi-language support to your app.

cards.title: Theme Switching
cards.description: Built-in dark/light theme switching with responsive design that works perfectly on all devices.

cards.title: Database Integration
cards.description: Type-safe database operations using Drizzle ORM with PostgreSQL support.

cards.title: Modern UI
cards.description: Beautiful and customizable user interface built with Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI components.

Testimonials.title: Trusted by Developers
Testimonials.description: See what other developers say about this template

cards.name: John Doe
cards.content: This template saved me tons of initial setup time. All the essential features are already configured.

cards.name: Jane Smith
cards.content: Clean code structure and detailed documentation. Team collaboration efficiency improved significantly.

cards.name: Mike Johnson
cards.content: Perfect MVP starting point. Helped me validate my product ideas quickly.

Pricing.title: Choose Your Plan
Pricing.description: Flexible pricing options to meet different needs
Pricing.credits_consumption_rule: Credit consumption rule: Text analysis consumes 1 credit, image analysis consumes 2 credits

0.name: Free
0.description: Perfect for individual developers and small projects

1.name: Pro
1.description: Best for growing teams and businesses

2.name: Enterprise
2.description: For large enterprises and custom needs

0.question: What features are included in this template?
0.answer: The template includes user authentication, payment integration, internationalization, theme switching, database integration, and other essential features for modern applications.

1.question: What payment methods are supported?
1.answer: Currently supports Stripe payment platform, and can be easily extended to support other payment methods like PayPal, WeChat Pay, etc.

2.question: Do you provide technical support?
2.answer: We provide detailed documentation and community support. Pro and Enterprise users also get priority technical support.

3.question: Can I customize the theme?
3.answer: Yes, the template is built with Tailwind CSS, making it easy to customize colors, fonts, and layouts.

4.question: How do I deploy this application?
4.answer: You can deploy to platforms like Vercel, Netlify, or any server that supports Node.js.

CTA.title: Start building your app today
CTA.description: Join thousands of developers using our template to build modern applications quickly

Footer.description: Modern Next.js application template to help you build great apps quickly.
